org.henrya.httpicnic.http

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.henrya.httpicnic.http.HttpRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpConnect, HttpDelete, HttpGet, HttpHead, HttpOptions, HttpPatch, HttpPost, HttpPut, HttpTrace

    public abstract class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for sending HTTP requests
    Author:
    Henry Anderson
